caption: A man took out a red box and handed it to a woman, but the woman didn't accept it and walked away. The woman walked slowly on the city streets. She made a call to a woman in a car. Another woman sitting on a couch answered a phone call. Then, a woman near the entrance of a shopping mall answered a call. The four of them gathered at a certain place. They sat in front of the bed in a bedroom and waved together. They then started drinking and taking selfies on the bed. Afterwards, the women posed in a brightly lit room. Two men stood by the riverside, admiring cherry blossoms. Four women stood on a rooftop terrace, drinking.
